About Me

Welcome to my website!

I am a web developer with a background in nursing and healthcare, and I am excited to showcase my transition into the world of high technology. With a passion for technology and a desire to make a difference, I made the decision to switch careers and pursue web development. On this website, you will find information about my technical skills, education and training, projects I have worked on, and my unique perspective as a nurse-turned-web developer. I believe that my background in healthcare, combined with my proficiency in programming languages and problem-solving skills, allows me to bring a fresh and valuable perspective to the field of web development. I invite you to explore my portfolio and learn more about how I can contribute to your web development needs.
